programme.title: The Brit Awards 2019
programme.desc: The 2019 Brit Awards will be held on 20 February 2019 at The O2 Arena in London. Jack Whitehall will be the host for the second year running.

programme.title: The Strangest Weather On Earth S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Series explores a range of fascinating weather events. Meet the eyewitnesses caught up in extraordinary events and discover the science behind these bizarre phenomena.

programme.title: Nigella At My Table S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: In her latest series, Nigella Lawson shares the food she cooks for family and friends. Whether offering up her fresh take on familiar classics, or creating new dishes inspired by different cuisines, Nigella ensures that everyday eating is always pleasurable, with a minimum of fuss.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 72
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes magician Shin Lim (Las Vegas residency "Limitless") and Henry Winkler ("Alien Superstar"). Comedian Rhea Butcher performs a stand-up routine.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is M. Mr. Moon has finally agreed to get cleaned up. Find him something from earth that can help make Mr. Moon sparkling clean.

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 18
programme.desc: A yellow-crested cockatoo joins Leo and Hero's game of musical statues. After learning more about the bird, the Junior Rangers travel to the rainforest to take it home. Katie finds out that a big fish in the garden pond is a whitespotted bamboo shark. The Junior Rangers sail to the Pacific Ocean to find a coral reef for the bamboo shark to live in.

programme.title: Dribble Like Fandi
programme.desc: Ryan Lee needs a pair of new football boots. A mysterious Karung guni man appears to give him a pair - one with secret powers. Ryan and his best friend Arthur thinks this could be football legend Fandi Ahmad's old boots. With the special boots, can they lead their team the Punggol Pumas to the top of the championship table?

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 21
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: TOBOT: Galaxy Detectives - EP 31
programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks reside on Seaside Island in Hedgehog Village. Together, they defend the island from various threats like Doctor Eggman and his robotic creation.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 25
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 10
programme.desc: A grieving Lloyd is possessed by the ghost of Morro - the Master of Wind and Wu's first student. In Lloyd's body, Morro renders the other ninja powerless before stealing Wu's staff. This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime to solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and get stuck in his game forever!

programme.title: Hari Raya Special
programme.desc: (Encore) Hosted by Fiza O, this Hari Raya Special features performances by Rahimah Rahim, Sufi Rashid and many others, as well as a special appearance by Taufik Batisah.

programme.title: Kramer vs Kramer (1979)
programme.desc: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 648
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The ZhuZhus - EP 6
programme.desc: The ZhuZhuPets are no ordinary pets, they are EXTRAORDINARY and they can talk! Always on a quest for fun, they have to stay on their tiny toes to keep up with the non-stop action, laughs and adventures.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series Yr 1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Based on Walt Disney Animation Studios Oscar-winning feature film.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 6
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos: Top 10 Countdown S2b - EP 1
programme.desc: Funny real-life moments captured on video are presented in this countdown clip show.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarok, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela. Starring Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Cate Blanchett and Tessa Thompson.

programme.title: News 5 - EP 52
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Seven Worlds One Planet - EP 5
programme.desc: From the colourful paradise of South America to the scorching heat of Africa, Seven Worlds: One Planet showcases the true character of each continent in turn and reveals just how it has shaped all life there. Be surprised by unexpected stories. Marvel at iconic landscapes. And be awestruck by spectacular wildlife.

programme.title: All Together Now UK S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: A singalong contest where singers face TV's biggest judging panel The 100' - made up of singers and experts from all musical backgrounds - to win 50,000.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: Lou Clark knows lots of things. What Lou doesn't know is she's about to lose her job or that knowing what's coming is what keeps her sane. Will Traynor knows a car accident took away his desire to live. He knows everything feels very small and rather joyless now and he knows exactly how he's going to put a stop to that. What Will doesn't know is that Lou is about to burst into his world in a riot of color. And neither of them knows they're going to change each other for all time.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: Lou Clark knows lots of things. What Lou doesn't know is she's about to lose her job or that knowing what's coming is what keeps her sane. Will Traynor knows a car accident took away his desire to live. He knows everything feels very small and rather joyless now and he knows exactly how he's going to put a stop to that. What Will doesn't know is that Lou is about to burst into his world in a riot of color. And neither of them knows they're going to change each other for all time.

programme.title: Love Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex have been best friends since they were 5, so they couldn't possibly be right for one another...or could they? When it comes to love, life and making the right choices, these two are their own worst enemies.

programme.title: The Royal Variety Performance 2018
programme.desc: Hosted by Greg Davies and featuring acts like Take That, the West End cast of the phenomenal hit musical Hamilton, the legendary Andrea Bocelli & his son Matteo, Britains Got Talent winner, comedian The Lost Voice Guy, a special performance from Rick Astley, the mesmerising Cirque Du Soleil, plus music from Sigrid and cellist Sheku Kanneh-Mason.

programme.title: Nature Cat S1 - EP 79
programme.desc: Nature Cat can't wait to get outside for a day of backyard nature excursions and bravery with friends! But there's 1 problem, he's still a house cat with no real instincts for nature. That doesn't stop this passionate and curious feline, who loves learning and experiencing all he can about nature.

programme.title: Lexi & Lottie - EP 9
programme.desc: Being identical twin sisters is an asset for 12-year-old detectives Lexi and Lottie, especially when it comes to cracking crimes in their home town of Appleton and its Animal Park. With their pet mouse which has a nose for clues, and their smart comic journalist friend Fred, the friends set about to solving crimes in their local neighborhood!

programme.title: Wa-Cheew! Rise Of A Kung-Fu Chef
programme.desc: Remy Chew has always dreamed of being a celebrity chef like Harry Lim. After being humiliated by Harry in a cooking showdown, Remy finds a secret cooking manual - The 18 Heavens. Will the secrets of Kung-Fu cooking help Remy to finally beat the famous Harry in a final showdown?

programme.title: Tobot S4 - EP 18
programme.desc: More adventures from "Tobots", cars that transform into robots to fight crime and protect their neighbourhood.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots S4 - EP 18
programme.desc: The Rescue Bots are Transformers that work with a family of heroes to rescue humans from disasters.

programme.title: Astroblast - EP 29
programme.desc: The coolest crew in the galaxy and the stars of the show; Comet, Halley, Sputnik, Radar and Jet are co-workers at the Frosty Star smoothie shop and the best of friends. Sure they are different, sure they make mistakes but through it all, the Astroblast family embraces their differences, makes new friends and discovers that working together makes everything better.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Hiccup, Sneeze and Bibi decide to make their own movie! How hard can it be? Hiccup is the director, Sneeze is the cameraman, and Bibi's sock puppets are the actors.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 12
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets, along with his best friend, Ruby invents his way out of every jam by re-purposing parts and objects into the coolest contraption ever.

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: From unexpected dinosaur pets and dragon guests to surprise treasure hunts and beyond, hilarious magical adventures are never far away with the two genies-in-training and three wishes a day.

programme.title: Stars In Style S5 - EP 7
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: Home Together - EP 23
programme.desc: In this episode, find out what is keeping Pierre Png busy during this circuit breaker period and learn how to whip a comforting bowl of sayur lodeh from Chef Bob. Plus, a brand new fitness segment with model-actress Fiona Fussi!

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe CLASS 95 - EP 33
programme.desc: (Live) Join Yasminne Cheng Live! as she hosts Lunchbreak on CLASS 95.

programme.title: One Republic: Live in South Africa
programme.desc: OneRepublic arrived in Johannesburg, South Africa, to play for 20,000 fans in an explosion of light and sound. Over a decade that saw them go from struggling musicians to multi-platinum, award-winning artists and one of the most popular bands on the planet, headlining a South African tour was the fulfilment of a dream and a promise. These virtuosic pop-stars perform all their smash hits, including Apologize, Counting Stars and Stop and Stare.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 3
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde - EP 17
programme.desc: Join the Enchantimals on their exciting adventures, where they head to Frozenwood in search of an ice cream that never melts and visit Grazy Grasslands, to help Merrit Monkey and Cherish Cheetah Enchantimals find the cure for hiccupitis!

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 20
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realise his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

programme.title: World's Funniest Videos: Top 10 Countdown S2b - EP 2
programme.desc: Funny real-life moments captured on video are presented in this countdown clip show.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) After pondering about it, Sen Mei decides to turn herself in to the Commercial Affairs Department. Sen Mei is confuse and does not understand that since she and Guan Ming is on the same boat, why would she then decides to report him? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)森美经过思考，决定去商业事务局自首，意外的是调查员告诉她，她在半年前曾经通过电邮的方式，向他们举报上司余冠铭涉嫌洗黑钱。森美顿时感到混乱，不解自己既然和冠铭同流合污，为什么要举报他？.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 10
programme.desc: This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. 《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 5
programme.desc: Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. At the end of each episode, relevant spokespersons will share with viewers various precautionary measures one could take when caught in similar situations. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans of the Earth - EP 10
programme.desc: The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. 主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 8
programme.desc: This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's traditional cuisine and its unique ingredient and spices.

programme.title: 新生之旅 Rites of Motherhood - EP 4
programme.desc: In Indonesias Bali, all phases of life, from conception to birth, are celebrated in different rites of passage. These rites of birth form the basic framework for the religious life of the people. Every ritual has a specific purpose, and laden with a special meaning. 在印度尼西亚的峇厘岛，每一个重要的人生阶段，都以传统的仪式来加以纪念。峇厘岛人是通过不同的习俗，来建立他们和神明的基本关系。每一项仪式，都有不同的涵义和目的。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 74
programme.desc: Ep 71: Yalan agrees to collaborate with Renhai Brewery behind Juxi's back and transfers a huge amount of money to Renhai Brewery as investment funds. Shortly after, Renhai Brewery folds. Yalan is unable to retrieve whatever that she has paid out. Worse, Pung Gil Dang has to repay Renhai Brewery's debts. Ep 71: 雅兰盗用菊熙的名义与仁海酿造合作，还把巨额投资金付给该公司。不久后，仁海酿造倒闭，雅兰一分钱都讨不回，丰吉堂还可能必须承担仁海酿造的债务。理事们要菊熙给他们一个交代。吴春要雅兰出面说是她盗用菊熙的印章在合约书上盖章的。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 76
programme.desc: Ep 72: Jixiu meets up with Yalan before the shareholders' meeting and makes a secret pact with her. Both Jixiu and Yalan vote for Juxi's dismissal at the shareholders' meeting. Ep 72: 吉秀在股东大会举行前约雅兰见面，两人达成秘密协议。股东大会上，吉秀代表没有出席的股东们支持将菊熙解任。紧要关头，雅兰也表示支持菊熙被解任。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 17Lewen stays with her mother outside the palace temporarily. She thinks of Li Ying when she sees her mother sewing the Heron Orchid pattern. The Queen has a premature baby. She rejects the help of the imperial doctor to deliver her child. After the baby girl is born, and without so much as a glance, she orders someone to get rid of the baby covertly. Yinsheng secretly witnesses Enunch Cheng carrying out the Queen's order......Ep 18After rescuing the baby girl, Yinsheng keeps her in a b Ep 17乐温在宫外与母亲暂时住下。她看着母亲绣鹭兰花，又想到自己与李旲，不禁内心酸楚。中殿娘娘提前一月早产，为掩人耳目，她拒绝太医接生，生下女婴后狠心地一眼未看便命人偷偷解决掉。成内官在处理此事时被胤圣暗中看到......Ep 18胤圣当日救下中殿娘娘的女婴后，将其寄养在青楼，让妓女们帮忙照养。金义教等人听李旲说抓到上次入侵东宫要杀他的剌客后，害怕李旲查到真相，私下里都慌了手脚，意图私下先去牢里杀人灭口......

programme.desc: The new season of the Chinese variety "Singer" is back with more electric performances from singers such as Jam Hsiao, Hua Chenyu, Zhou Shen, Misia and Lala Hsu etc. 《歌手·当打之年》是湖南卫视推出的音乐竞技节目。该节目的首发歌手为华晨宇、Misia、萧敬腾、徐佳莹、袁娅维、毛不易、周深，由萧敬腾担任该节目的音乐串讲人。节目每期邀请专业歌手进行歌唱竞赛，并提供平等竞技舞台。赛制在基础上作出了重大革新，取消了原有的补位和踢馆机制，设立全新的奇袭赛制。.

programme.title: 我的救护车 My Ambulance - EP 5
programme.desc: Peng, an emergency room resident and Tantawan have been in love for 15 years. Tantawan, who owns magical power, starts to doubt whether Peng still loves her. One day, they met a traffic accident and Tantawan is seriously injured. When she wakes up, she loses all her memories. Unbeknownst to her, the truth about the accident was hidden..

programme.title: Zakat Zakaria
programme.desc: ZAKAT ZAKARIA chronicles the misadventures of an arrogant businessman, Zakaria, who learns the importance of zakat when he loses everything in his life Swallowing up his ego, he has no choice but to learn the error of his ways from the only friend who is willing to help, Sadiq, the janitor he fired.

programme.title: Menantu International Nak Raya
programme.desc: Aman and Jamaliahs family, face new challenges this Ramadan & Raya. Happy finds her first fasting tough. Melissas daughters are spending their Hari Raya without their father for the first time. Mel is 7 months pregnant and Bryan is worried that Mel is fasting during her pregnancy.

programme.title: Menanti Syawal
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. The hour-long drama focuses on Syawal, a photojournalist in his mid-30s, and Amira, a young lawyer in her early 30s. The two are as different as chalk and cheese. Amira is a prim and proper lawyer who complements her pastel-coloured tudungs with smart pantsuits. She is also active in social work. A supremely confident young woman, finding a husband is the least of her concerns, in contrast to the worry her mum has.Syawal, on the other hand, is an easygoing fellow. But beneath that carefree attitude lies a responsible person that puts even Amira to shame when she discovers the real person. But while their friendship progresses, Amira is reluctant to take it to the next step, much to Syawal's disappointment.Syawal subsequently heads for the Middle East during Ramadan 2011 to perform the umrah before going to Egypt for some photography assignment. A replay of the Arab Spring at Cairo's Tahrir Square during that period leaves Amira wonderi.

programme.title: Batang Buruk Lesung Batu
programme.desc: A grandfather and his two grandchildren learns how to celebrate Raya for the first time without their beloved Opah. Learning a lesson about acceptance, love and reminiscing the good times over kuih Batang Buruk.

programme.title: Ketawa Jer - EP 5
programme.desc: Hari Raya: Tuan Haron organizes a charity drive for Hari Raya and somehow in the midst of it gets into a misunderstanding with Pak Malik.

programme.title: Hari Raya Joey
programme.desc: Hari Raya Joey is a variety special, with song performances by child talents and dancers. Driven by five main characters, the skit is about a boy - Joey, played by Md Faeez Hafes, who wishes for a complete family gathering during Hari Raya and realizes that his wish causes chaos to the family. Find out how Joey schemed a surprise for the return of his favorite Uncle for Hari Raya this year. Featuring award winning actors and actresses - Mastura Ahmad, Khairudin Samsudin, Izzat Yusof and Izyan Mellyna, with special appearance by Sufi Rashid.

programme.title: Sinar Lebaran 2020
programme.desc: With the theme "Stand United", Sinar Lebaran 2020 will celebrate the reunification of ties that bind, renew and rekindle relationship between family, neighbours and friends. The variety programme with comedic elements will also showcase a colorful amalgamation of not just traditions but also the array of music genres. Sinar Lebaran 2020 will be hosted by Fauzie Laily and Nurul Aini and includes star studded artistes like Taufik Batisah, Hady Mirza, Jatt Ali, Wann, Rahila Rashun, Farhan Shah.

programme.title: 16 Puasa
programme.desc: A group of men in a small village plan not to fast during the month of Ramadan. Though they know that it is against the religion, they do this quietly and keep their bad deeds a secret from their respective wives. They even have a fixed timetable on who will buy the food for the rest of the gang and eat at a discreet location where no one can see them. But their daily routine is halted when Pak Jabit, the village head, together with other villagers saw them eating by the river bank.

programme.title: J.K.K Raya 2019
programme.desc: Festive season is approaching and everyone wants to be stylish but what else is the problem with this village? Watch this entertaining and comedy variety show.

programme.title: Syawal Untuk Semah
programme.desc: Semah's overly shower of love towards Syawal made him selfish and snobbish. Syawal makes Semah sell her land to finance his business but was stopped by his aunt, Mak Timah. Syawal was hurt by Mak Timah's action who he feels is trying to control their lives. Syawal is determined to get Semah to live with him in town and bad mouthed Mak Timah. But Syawal's wife does not like Semah and things turns to worse. Mak Timah takes Semah to live with her.

programme.title: Ketuk Ketuk Syawal 2019
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite cooking show, Ketuk-Ketuk Syawal is back.In this one hour special edition, Sheila travels to sunny island Singapore.Featuring our local funny man Suhaimi Yusof and Shahrol Shiro, join them as they share more about their preparations for Aidilfitri. Also catch exclusive bloopers and behind the scenes from the previous episodes of Ketuk-Ketuk Ramadan.

programme.title: Aidilfitri Serata Dunia S2
programme.desc: Showcase how Muslim minorities around the world celebrate this joyous holiday. In the second series, we will start with observing the moon to mark the holiday at the Seaside in Taiwan, the Sholat at the floating City Mosque in Kota Kinabalu, Sabah and ends with the festive house visiting in the riverside villages in Sarawak, Borneo.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 54
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Maid Raya
programme.desc: Two 'maids' make an open house and invited people while their employers are out of town. Their charade is found out when the employer came back much earlier than expected and reveal to the guests that they are only her maids. Maid Raya is a star-studded variety show following the story of two maids who host an open house while their employers are out of town. Their plan backfires when their employer returns home earlier than expected. Featuring special performances by Ernie Zakri, Haqiem Rusli, Wany Hasrita, Tajul, Khai Bahar, Sufian Suhaimi, Bell Ngasri, Ropie, Izzue Islam and Wan Sharmila.

programme.title: Bikers Kental 2
programme.desc: Bikers Kental 2 is a 2019 Malaysian action comedy road film. A sequel to the 2013 film Bikers Kental, the film continues the gang's motorcycle road trip adventure in southern Thailand six years later, as they fight the enemies and win back love. As Bidin tries to convince his Thai girlfriend's family to let him marry her, he also has to settle an issue between him and an old enemy of his.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 54
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Lap Lip
programme.desc: When Alias's granddaughters asked why he has never put up lap-lip for Hari Raya - his response is simple; their grandmother got electrocuted by lap-lip and that's why he do not want history to repeat itself. But the true history goes way back, Alias and his brother Mokhsin were the ones who brought in the electric lap-lip hype to Jalan Hari Raya after moving in from Malaysia. That became an annual competition. It's all fun and friendly till one year - things took a turn. Alias refuses to tell his grandchildren why he does not put up lap-lip for Hari Raya. However, the truth is that Alias and his brother Mokhsin were the ones who brought in the electric lap-lip hype to Jalan Hari Raya after moving in from Malaysia, which eventually became an annual competition. It was all fun and friendly till one year — things took a bad turn and their relationship sours to no return.

programme.title: Anak Bulan
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Borrowing formulas from successful Hari Raya Aidilfitri telemovies, Anak Bulan is a nostalgic festive comedy nest described as Bubur Masjid, Air Katira meets Fighting Spiders. What will happen when Muhammad and Zaki’s families tell them that the “anak bulan” will appear earlier than expected? Will they be able to complete their raya preparations on time?

programme.title: Suara Takbir
programme.desc: Three brothers aim for a set of Baju Raya yet it turned out for a more meaningful gift for the entire family in the end when the youngest brother can now hear the sound of Takbir. Three brothers aim for a set of Baju Raya yet it turned out for a more meaningful gift for the entire family in the end when the youngest brother can now hear the sound of Takbir.

programme.title: Raya Sempurna

programme.title: Baju Raya Ekslusif
programme.desc: Shunurin and Hazwani are cousins. This year, they plan to sell exclusive clothes online. In town they meet Ramlah who introduced herself as a boutique agent. Upon hearing Ramlah's business plans, Shunurin and Hazwani are interested to use their saving as capital for the start-up of the business. Their business flourishes. However, at the end of the fasting month, Ramlah disappeared with their money.

programme.title: Raya Kolumpo

This led to some conflicts in their families when he wanted to celebrate Raya in KL. Various incidents occurred when Mr Jalal was trying to bring "kampung feel" to the city.

programme.title: 17 Puasa
programme.desc: A sequal of 16 Puasa, this is a comedic story of six bumbling friends who constantly face difficulties to fast during Ramadan. Working together, they always find ways to consume their midday meals - but not this time. They are sent to visit Hospital Tanjung Rambutan for Rashid's health, where they face many obstacles that prevent them from eating - including bumping into a hearse that reminds them of the end of time.

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini - Dato Siti Nurhaliza

programme.title: Lensa Ramadan 2020 - EP 5
programme.desc: Muslims in Singapore and around the world welcome the month of Ramadan amidst the COVID-19 pandemic. This has tremendous impact on the various rituals synonymous to the Holy month, as well as preparations for Hari Raya. Lensa 2020 aim to capture how Muslim here and elsewhere navigate the difficult adjustments and sacrifices needed due to COVID-19, while keeping the Ramadan spirits alive.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: SOS Sihat Oh Sihat is a medical and health themed infotainment talk show, formatted after Mediacorp Channel 8's successful health talk show series, Body SOS. programme.title: Dia Yang Ku Cinta - EP 6
programme.desc: Cempaka and her brother Iman are stepchildren of Tuan Khalid and Marhanna. However Marhanna and her daughter Lara Andrew hated the two siblings and often abused them. They pretended to be kind in the presence of Tuan Khalid and Hafiz Andrew. Both Hafiz and Lara are also stepchildren of Tuan Khalid. They are the children of Marhanna and her ex-husband, an English man. Cempaka decided to leave the house but her love for Hafiz prevented her from leaving the house. What will happen to them? Zack finds out he is merely a pawn in Ryan’s mission to pay off his debt to Rio. Sofea witnesses an unconscious Borhan being handled by Farouk and informs Zack. Alarmed, they seek Farouk out but had no proof of him being connected to Borhan’s disappearance. Zack is seriously injured while defending himself and Sofea from an ambush attack by a group of hooligans. Ryan is pleased and confident the injury will cause Zack to lose an important MMA match, which he had placed a huge bet on the contender.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Kembara Kasih 2 (A Journey of Love 2)Kembara Kasih visits five different Southeast Asian countries to explore and pull for five different charitable causes. Captured as a personal account through first-hand experiences and he touching stories of real locals. Kembara Kasih takes our celebrity host, Dalina Jaapar, different third world countries to explore and support four different charitable causes. Experience her joys, fears and tears as we watch her volunteer with fellow Singaporean volunteers to accomplish challenging tasks such as building water systems, reaching out to people with cleft lip, encouraging dumpsite children to go to school, and helping street children get a future. Will she succeed? What obstacles will she encounter? Will she give up? Most importantly, what difference will she make? And what can she learn from the other volunteers?

programme.title: Kavasam
programme.desc: Kavasam (The Shield) is a story about our frontline medical professionals at Marsha Hill Hospital. Led by Chief Suresan, the doctors and nurses deal with life-or-death consequences on a daily basis. With secrets, fears, and losses of their own, they face the terrifying day of their lives when the hospital goes into lockdown as a dangerous patient collapses on hospital grounds with near-fatal injuries. When the past catches up with their profession it gets fatally personal. Trained to save lives, can they save themselves?

programme.desc: A deeper look at events packed in a one-hour show for wider knowledge, greater understanding, and better comprehension of the news that matter.

programme.title: AWANI Review
programme.desc: AWANI Review with Cynthia Ng is a series of in-depth conversations with industry captains and influential leaders shaping the future of business.

programme.title: TFIF
programme.desc: 'The Future Is Female' aims to the teach girls to grow up and be brave instead of perfect. To feel beautiful for being smart and strong. For society, policymakers and corporations to view men and women thr.

programme.title: Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Berita Tengah Malam yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Smart Parents
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan motivasi tv yang akan membincangkan tentang tips ibu-bapa bijak anak hebat. Episod kali ini membincangkan topik 'Biar Nampak Primitis Asalkan Anak Kreatif' bersama hos Zaid Mohamad.

programme.title: Bakul Telur Emas
programme.desc: Bakul Telur Emas pada minggu ini membincangkan tentang topik Sekeping Kad Berbunga bersama Alwi Adam seorang Pakar Perunding Kewangan.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Al-Mulki Nusantara episod ini menceritakan tentang Kerajaan Islam Nusantara (Srivijaya II).

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Doktor Pokok adalah sebuah rancangan yang bertemakan Kenali Penyakit Pelihara Tanaman yang dihoskan oleh Heliza Helmi. Episod kali ini membawa anda untuk mengenali tentang baja luar biasa.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Iswan Ismail, episod kali ini membincangkan tentang pertubuhan bukan kerajaan yang dibina untuk perjuangkan hak kepelbagaian kaum di Malaysia antaranya Perkim, Hidayah Centre Foundation, Macma dan lain lain lagi.

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini memaparkan kisah pesakit yang mengalami Gangguan Pemakanan (Bulimia Nervosa).

programme.title: Langit Borneo
programme.desc: Mengembara dan menerokakeindahan suasana bandar dan desa di kepulauan Borneo seperti Ladang The Sabah, Kuala Belait Brunei, Felda Sahabat Lahad Datu, Kota Pontianak Kalimanatan Barat, Kampung Mesilou Kundasang, Bangunan Pentadbiran Sabah Kota Kinabalu dan Pulau Sebatik Kalimantan Barat yang sentiasa menjadi tarikan pelancong.

programme.title: Legenda Seni
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan kehidupan tokoh seni tanah air yang dihoskan oleh Sabhi Saddi.

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Ladang (Siri 2)
programme.desc: Bersama Alif Hadi ke ladang perusahaan kayu manis milik En Asnin dan perkongsian resepi Sup Buntui.

programme.title: 3P
programme.desc: Bersama pengacara, Baki Zainal akan membawa penonton meninjau dan menyelami sesuatu kerjaya yang mempunyai tiga ciri utama iaituPanas, Penat dan Pelik.

programme.title: Dimensi Cergas
programme.desc: Dimensi Cergas episod ini memaparkan latihan kecergasan untuk kekal cergas dan cantik atau the fit and beautiful.

programme.title: Refleksi Aktif
programme.desc: Bersama hos Fariha Razak menyelami latihan-latihan yang dilaksanakan oleh atlet-atlet berprestasi tinggi dalam meningkatkan prestasi mereka.

programme.title: Santri Serumpun
programme.desc: Program kembara ke pusat pengajian agama di Indonesia.

programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: NHK World Special
programme.desc: The Vaganova Academy in Russia is the world's leading ballet school. Meet its graduating boys' class as they rehearse for a show at the Mariinsky Theatre and audition for the top ballet companies.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Cool Japan
programme.desc: The panelists examine notable examples of kindergarten curricula, preschool educational magazines and early sports training in Japan, and evaluate them in comparison with standards in other countries.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo Life
programme.desc: The top three geisha idol celebrities in Edo: Tomimoto Toyohina, Takashima Ohisa, and Naniwaya Kita. See how Kitagawa Utamaro, the master of female beauty has illustrated them so differently.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Anime Supernova
programme.desc: With over 50 music videos on his resume, Sugimoto Kosuke has been able to combine audio and visuals in ways not many others can. Join us and find out the secret behind his creativity.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Strange creatures scampering on the train tracks! Tiny critters taking over the sidewalk! The Tokyo Wildlife Survey Team searches for amazing wildlife in spring right in the heart of the metropolis!

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo: Mini
programme.desc: Japanese corn is amazingly sweet. We visit Hokkaido's large corn fields to see how it is grown. We also discover a popular cornbread, unique French dishes that feature corn and more.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Global Agenda Plus
programme.desc: Stay-at-home orders in response to COVID-19 have caused widespread hardship. Their relaxation raises concerns about renewed infection. We explores ways that we can ensure that people and the economy remain healthy.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: Full and detailed coverage of rapidly changing developments both in Japan and abroad.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: This episode shows how actors, musicians, and other artists in Japan are adapting by taking their live acts online as the performing arts world struggles to survive during the COVID-19 pandemic.

programme.title: NHK World Special
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: There's a potentially potent weapon in the fight against COVID-19: big data. Using AI, NHK works with experts to analyze the latest research and unravel the mechanisms of the novel coronavirus.

programme.title: A Week in Interviews

programme.title: Depth Perception
programme.desc: Snowboarder Travis Rice and friends ponder the personal connection between rider and Nature. Travis Rice returns to the roots of snowboarding in his latest brainchild as he and fellow riders head to British Columbia’s temperate forest, the furthest inland rainforest in the world, and show the unique connection each rider shares with nature.

programme.title: Frank Mauer
programme.desc: How does German hockey player Frank Mauer cope after reaching milestones that put pressure on him? German hockey player Frank Mauer is an athlete at the peak of his career, with four DEL titles and an Olympic silver medal. How well does he cope after reaching milestones that pile on the pressure?

programme.title: Matt McIlvane
programme.desc: How was hockey coach Matt McIlvane's attitude towards life influenced by the end of his career as a player? During his life as an ice hockey player, not everything went smoothly for Matt McIlvane, whose career ended early due to injury. But as a young assistant coach he has already collected more titles than most of his colleagues.

programme.title: Toby Price gives Sam Sunderland a new look
programme.desc: Toby Price shares his love of stylish haircuts in the bivouac by giving Sam Sunderland a trim. Toby Price shares his love of stylish haircuts in the bivouac by giving Sam Sunderland a trim. Sunderland's head doesn't offer a lot of room for variety, but Price will give him a new look anyway.

programme.title: Matthias Walkner in a close shave with Toby Price
programme.desc: Find out how Matthias Walkner fared when he braved the barber's chair to be trimmed by Toby Price. The Bivouac Barber, aka Toby Price, sets his sights and his clippers on the hair of his Red Bull KTM team-mate Matthias Walkner at the 2020 Dakar Rally in Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: Ross Branch trusts Toby Price for a trim
programme.desc: Ross Branch opts to skip out on the bowl cut when Toby Price takes on the role of barber. Ross Branch opts to skip out on the bowl cut when Toby Price takes on the role of barber in the bivouac trenches during Dakar Rally 2020 in Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: Chapter One
programme.desc: The best kiteboard riders in the world come together to show off the sport’s breathtaking beauty. Adventure. Challenge. The simple joy of riding the wind. The best kiteboard riders each have their own reasons for pursuing their sport to its uttermost limits, but they’re united in revealing its breathtaking beauty to the world.

programme.title: Crossing Corsica
programme.desc: Ultrarunner François d’Haene attempts to break the record for running the 180km GR20 trail. French ultrarunner and winemaker François d’Haene attempts to cross Corsica from north to south along the legendary 180km-long GR20 mountain trail in world record-breaking time – under 31 hours and 6 minutes.

programme.title: Tour Biel/Bienne with the B-Boys
programme.desc: Did you know that Biel/Bienne in Switzerland is the birthplace of Red Bull BC One? Did you know that Biel/Bienne in Switzerland is the birthplace of Red Bull BC One? Let Artur, Baby OG, Dr. Hill and all the Swiss Cypher winners show you their favourite places in the city.

programme.title: Tour Madrid with Xak
programme.desc: Travel to all the landmarks Madrid, Spain, has to offer with breakdancer Xak as he hits the streets. Travel to all the landmarks Madrid, Spain, has to offer with breakdancer Xak as he hits the streets and makes some friends along the way.

programme.title: Tour Geneva with Perla
programme.desc: Take a walk through Geneva, Switzerland, like never before with local B-Girl Perla. Take a walk through Geneva like never before with local B-Girl Perla, as she shows you around one of Switzerland’s most vibrant cities.

programme.title: Tour Basel with Tuff Kid
programme.desc: Travel to all the landmarks Switzerland's Basel has to offer with B-Boy Tuff Kid as he dances the streets. Take in all the landmarks of Switzerland's Basel as B-Boy Tuff Kid hits the streets, parks and waterways in the best way he knows how: dancing.

programme.title: Choose your instrument wisely
programme.desc: S1 E4 – The top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge before they can claim victory. S1 E4 – After creating an original track with their new partners, the top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge to face before they get a chance to land a publishing deal.

programme.title: Kenya
programme.desc: Rob Warner heads to Kenya with freeride pro Matt Jones to ride Mount Kenya. Rob Warner heads to Kenya with freeride pro Matt Jones where they ride one of the highest mountains in Africa and get up close to some of the local wildlife.

programme.title: Lesotho
programme.desc: Rob Warner, along with Matt Jones, head to Lesotho where get to experience a different kind of racing. Rob Warner, along with Matt Jones, head to Lesotho where get to experience a different kind of racing. While Matt rides down and around a gorge, Rob takes a shortcut.

programme.title: Saturdays
programme.desc: Check out some of the most progressive skateboarding ever captured on film. Featuring the legendary Tony Hawk and some of the most progressive skateboarding ever captured, Saturdays was shot over three years on location at iconic spots across the globe. Check out this long-awaited new film from Birdhouse Skateboards here.

programme.title: La Esfinge
programme.desc: Long-time friend and professional climber Emily Harrington takes Michelle out of her comfort zone in Peru. Trading ski poles for cams and ski boots for climbing shoes, long-time friend and professional climber Emily Harrington takes Michelle out of her comfort zone on ‘The Sphinx’.

programme.title: Skiing is dead
programme.desc: Follow Michelle and the crew through the trials and tribulations of producing and shooting Chris Benchetler's film Fire On The Mountain in 100mph winds and heavy snow flurries. Will they pull it off? Follow Michelle and the crew through the trials and tribulations of producing and shooting in 100mph winds and heavy snow flurries. Will they pull it off?

programme.title: Under an Arctic Sky
programme.sub-title: Searching for waves in the storm
programme.desc: A group of surfers, along with photographer Chris Burkard, journey to Iceland in search of perfect waves. A group of surfers, along with photographer Chris Burkard, journey to Iceland’s north coast in search of perfect waves during the country's largest storm in 25 years.

programme.title: Transition
programme.desc: Bomber discusses the end of his pro gaming career and why he still fights on in the StarCraft II scene. As Bomber faces mandatory military service in South Korea, others reflect on his legacy, and Bomber speaks about what it means to end his pro gaming career and why he still fights on in the StarCraft II scene.
